Text: Order received by AllDirectcomPST Stacey White Thank you for your recent order placed through Yahoo Shopping Your order has been received by AllDirectcom and is being processed It usually takes business days to process an order When this processing has been completed our order department will send an email to the email address submitted with your order to notify you that it was shipped For information on shipping times please visit our web site Your order number for this order is If you have any questions or comments about your order direct them to llDirectcom Please include your order number in any correspondence with us Thanks for visiting AllDirectcom Customer Service llDirectcom AllDirectcom Great Selection Even Better Prices
